repast.simphony.demos.sugarscape2.space.rules.growback

Class SeasonalGrowback

  • java.lang.Object
    • repast.simphony.demos.sugarscape2.space.rules.growback.DefaultGrowback
      • repast.simphony.demos.sugarscape2.space.rules.growback.SeasonalGrowback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GrowbackAbility, ConfigurableFromRepastEnvironment

    public class SeasonalGrowback
extends DefaultGrowback
    The grid is separated in two parts, one upper and one lower. Additionally, there are two seasons: summer and winter There are different growback rate changes in seasons. When there is winter in the upper part, there is summer in the lower, and vice versa.
    Author:
    Dimitrios Kremmydas
